title: About Me
text:
I am currently pursuing a Master of Data Science at the University of British Columbia (UBC). I recently graduated with a BSc in Data Science from GIKI.
I have hands-on experience in machine learning, NLP, Python, data analysis, data visualization, data engineering, and Power BI through multiple academic projects and internships. I‚Äôve interned at KPMG and Dynamic Solutions, working on data governance, dashboards, and NLP applications.
I am passionate about leveraging data science to solve real-world problems, with particular interest in elections transparency, automation, and sports analytics.

title: Projects & Experience
text:
üèÜ Selected Projects


CurveBall ‚Äî Cricket Analytics & Genetic Algorithm
Sep 2024 ‚Äì Jun 2025 | GIKI
- Developed a cricket analytics system with T20/ODI score predictors, genetic algorithm-based team generator, and video analytics using scikit-learn, OpenCV, NumPy.
- Built an interactive dashboard for real-time tracking, match simulation, and player analytics.
- Integrated an AI-powered chatbot and ML models for score prediction and team optimization.


Sentiment-Driven Stock Prediction
Sep 2024 ‚Äì Jan 2025 | GIKI
- Scraped DAWN News headlines to calculate sentiment scores and combined with HBL stock prices.
- Trained an LSTM model to predict stock trends and generated interactive time series visualizations.


Coin Canvas ‚Äî Cryptocurrency Analytics
Sep 2023 ‚Äì Jan 2024 | GIKI
- Implemented web scraping for real-time and historical cryptocurrency data.
- Built 3 interactive dashboards in Power BI for actionable insights.


InvestiSight ‚Äî Financial Report NLP
May 2024 ‚Äì Jun 2024 | Personal Project
- Extracted key insights from financial analyst reports using DistilRoBERTa and deployed a Flask app for real-time analysis.


AI Interview Coach
Feb 2025 ‚Äì Apr 2025 | GIKI
- Developed a voice-driven AI interview coach with OpenAI Whisper, TTS, GPT evaluation, Flask backend, and React frontend.
- Enabled role-specific customization and real-time feedback for job interview preparation.


Predicting Crime Hotspots in Chicago
Feb 2025 ‚Äì Apr 2025 | GIKI
- Analyzed 7.8M+ crime records with Apache Spark and performed temporal/spatial feature engineering.
- Applied K-Means clustering for high-density hotspot detection.
- Delivered actionable insights to support public safety planning.


Vancouver Crime Predictor
Nov 2025 ‚Äì Dec 2025 | UBC
- Built a reproducible ML pipeline using Docker & Docker Compose for environment-agnostic execution on 530,000+ crime records.
- Preprocessed data and engineered features for temporal and spatial analysis.
- Trained and compared Logistic Regression, KNN, SVM models to classify crime types.
- Generated insights & visualizations to aid resource allocation and documented workflow reproducibly.
